content: st to end round 10- work round 4 18 sts per side round 14- work round 4 26 sts per side round 11- work round 9 round 15- work round 13 round 12- work round 4 20 sts per side round 16- work round 4 28 sts per side rnds 13-17- work round 9 five times rnds 17-23- work round 13 seven times round 18- decrease single_crochet to 2 sts before marker decrease twice round 24- decrease single_crochet to 2 sts before marker decrease 18 sts per side twice 26 sts per side working right top right top working on right half only sock dk round 1- split for top single_crochet in next 13 sts skip 26 sts front round 1- split for top single_crochet in next 9 sts skip 18 sts front and and back of left half of heart join to center of back side back of left half of heart join to center of back side place marker single_crochet in next 13 sts place marker place marker single_crochet in next 9 sts place marker round 2- decrease single_crochet to 2 sts before marker decrease twice round 2- decrease single_crochet to 2 sts before marker decrease twice 2 sts decreased per side 2 sts decreased per side rnds 3-9- work round 2 five more times 3 sts per side rnds 3-4- work round 2 two more times 3 sts per side sock/dk cut yarn use tail to cinch top 6 sts leave tail out stuff heart with polyfil or scraps of fabric or yarn version 1 may 12 2023 2 plushy heart crochet working left top left top working on left half only attach yarn at front center of heart leave tail out sock dk round 1- single_crochet in next 13 sts place marker single_crochet in next 13 sts round 1- single_crochet in next 9 sts place marker single_crochet in next 9 sts join to front center of heart place marker join to front center of heart place marker rnds 2-9- work as right top rnds 2-9 rnds 2-4- work as right top rnds 2-4 sock/dk cut yarn use tail to cinch top 6 sts leave tail out stuff rest of heart with polyfil or scraps of fabric or yarn finishing sock/dk use tapestry needle to thread top two tails into the heart pulling the yarn all the way through to tug top of heart point down makes it round instead of pointy stitch center hole with tail weave in ends hiding ends and assisting top shape if you choose not to stuff your heart and keep it flat i recommend gentle wet blocking version 1 may 12 2023 3 plushy heart crochet yarn and design s that inspire your greatest creations www yarnover newyork
